AT.name: Infinite Dunamis
AT.description: Infinite Dunamis verbindet Magie und Technologie miteinander und erschafft so ein episches Sci-Fi Rollenspiel-Game mit neuen, rundenbasierten Kämpfen! Auf dem Heimweg von seiner Arbeit in der Königlichen Stadt begegnet der begabte Mechaniker Luke einer jungen Frau, Estelle, die in einer Höhle nahe seinem Dorf angegriffen wird. Er wehrt ihre Angreifer ab, doch als er versucht, sie aus einem Haufen ausrangierter Metallteile zu befreien, stellt er fest, dass sie selbst zur Hälfte ein Roboter ist! Neugierig, auf was er da gestoßen ist, beschließt Luke, Estelle mit nach Hause zu nehmen, um sie zu reparieren. Doch er ahnt nicht, welche Kettenreaktion er damit in Gang setzt ...! Mit seiner einzigartigen Steampunk-Atmosphäre, packenden Wendungen und dem klassischen, rundenbasierten Kampfsystem mit überraschenden Twists, stellt Infinite Dunamis selbst die unersättlichsten RPG-Spieler zufrieden! Durch eine Fülle an Funktionen, wie zum Beispiel der Erweiterung von Waffen, der Erlangung von Zauberfähigkeiten oder der Möglichkeit, Estelles Parameter durch die Nutzung von Kristallen, Seelen und neuen Kernfunktionen zu stärken, schafft das Spiel es darüber hinaus, den Spielern zahllose Stunden Spielvergnügen zu schenken.

AU.name: Infinite Dunamis
AU.description: Merging magic and technology, Infinite Dunamis ups the ante with new turn-based battles in an epic RPG adventure! One day on his way home from a job in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by the name of Luke comes across a young woman, Estelle, being attacked in the cave near his village. After fending off her attackers, he attempts to pull her from a heap of discarded mechanical parts only to discover she herself is half robot! Somewhat curious about what he has stumbled onto, Luke decides to take Estelle home and fix her up, but little does he know about the chain of events he is about to find himself tangled up in...! With its unique steam-punk setting, gripping plot-twists, and classic turn-based battle system with a twist, Infinite Dunamis is the RPG to satisfy even the hungriest of gamers! Moreover, with its plethora of features like weapon enhancement, magic skills, and the ability to strengthen Estelle's parameters through the use of crystals, souls, and cores, gamers are sure to experience countless hours of enjoyment!

BG.name: Infinite Dunamis
BG.description: Merging magic and technology, Infinite Dunamis ups the ante with new turn-based battles in an epic RPG adventure! One day on his way home from a job in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by the name of Luke comes across a young woman, Estelle, being attacked in the cave near his village. With its unique steam-punk setting, gripping plot-twists, and classic turn-based battle system with a twist, Infinite Dunamis is the RPG to satisfy even the hungriest of gamers! Moreover, with its plethora of features like weapon enhancement, magic skills, and the ability to strengthen Estelle's parameters through the use of crystals, souls, and cores, gamers are sure to experience countless hours of enjoyment!

BE.name: Infinite Dunamis
BE.description: Un RPG au monde science-fiction qui mêle magie et technologie. Une épopée rythmée de combats au tour par tour ! Un jour, alors qu'il revient de son dernier travail à la Cité Royale, un ingénieur surdoué du nom de Luke tombe sur une jeune femme, Estelle, alors qu'elle est attaquée dans une grotte près de son village. Après avoir repoussé ses attaquants, il tente de la tirer d'un monceau de pièces détachées au rebut avant de découvrir qu'elle-même est en partie robot ! Sa curiosité éveillée, Luke décide de la ramener chez lui pour la réparer, sans se douter de l'engrenage dans lequel il vient de s'engager... Un scénario bourré de rebondissements, un monde éblouissant, un système de combat tour-par-tour et des ennemis puissants et variés pour captiver les joueurs les plus exigeants ! Avec des particularités comme l'amélioration des armes, l'apprentissage d'aptitudes magiques, et le renforcement d'Estelle par des cristaux, âmes et noyaux, Infinite Dunamis offre un défi assuré et d'innombrables heures de jeu !

With its unique steam-punk setting, gripping plot-twists, and classic turn-based battle system with a twist, Infinite Dunamis is the RPG to satisfy even the hungriest of gamers! ES.name: Infinite Dunamis
ES.description: Un juego de ciencia-ficción que une magia y tecnología. Parte hacia una aventura con combates por turnos! Un día, mientras volvía de la Ciudad Real, un dotado ingeniero llamado Luke, encuentra a una joven, Estelle, mientras era atacada en una caverna cerca de su aldea. Tras salvarla de sus atacantes, descubre tener que extraerla de una montaña de escombros y piezas de maquinaria, dándose cuenta así de que la chica es un medio robot! Curioso por este descubrimiento, Luke decide llevarse a Estelle a su casa para arreglarla sin imaginarse la cadena de eventos en los que se vería involucrado. Con un guión original lleno de sorpresas, y el clásico sistema de combates por turnos, Infinite Dunamis se cualifica como juego de rol apasionante! Además, con el sistema de fortalecimiento de armas, magia y habilidades, y con la posibilidad de modificar los parámetros de Estelle usando cristales y núcleos, promete una agradable experiencia de innumerables horas de juego!

IT.name: Infinite Dunamis
IT.description: Unendo magia e tecnologia, Infinite Dunamis si presenta come un Gioco di Ruolo insieme avventuroso e drammatico, con un sistema di combattimento a turni! Un giorno, mentre tornava dalla Città Reale, un dotato ingegnere dal nome Luke incontra una giovane ragazza, Estelle, mentre subisce un attacco in una caverna vicino al suo villaggio. Dopo averla salvata dagli attaccanti, si ritrova a doverla estrarre da una montagna di carcasse di macchine e viene così a scoprire che la ragazza è un mezzo robot! Incuriosito da questa scoperta, Luke decide di portarsi a casa Estelle per rimetterla in sesto, senza immaginare la catena di eventi che lo avrebbero coinvolto...! Con una sceneggiatura originale piena di colpi di scena, e il classico sistema di combattimento a turni, Infinite Dunamis si qualifica come gioco di ruolo appassionante! In più, con il sistema di potenziamento delle armi, magie e abilità, e la possibilità di modificare i parametri di Estelle attraverso l'uso di cristalli e nuclei, promette una piacevole esperienza di innumerevoli ore di gioco!

Moreover, with its plethora of features like weapon enhancement, magic skills, and the ability to strengthen Estelle's parameters through the use of crystals, souls, and cores, gamers are sure to experience countless hours of enjoyment!

NL.name: Infinite Dunamis
NL.description: Een spannende Sci-Fi RPG waarin magie en technologie het tegen elkaar opnemen. Ga op een episch avontuur met turn-based gevechten! Op een dag, onderweg naar huis van een klus in de Hoofdstad, komt de jonge technicus Luke een jonge vrouw, Estelle, tegen terwijl ze wordt aangevallen in een grot vlakbij zijn dorp. Nadat hij haar aanvallers heeft afgeschrikt probeert hij haar uit een hoop oude robotonderdelen te bevrijden waarbij hij er achter komt dat zij zelf half robot is! Nieuwsgierig naar wat hij is tegengekomen besluit hij Estelle mee te nemen naar zijn werkplaats om haar daar te repareren. Nietsvermoedend dat zijn beslissing enorme gevolgen zal hebben...! Het unieke verhaal met verrassende plot-twists, de mooie wereld, klassieke turn-based gevechten en de vele krachtige vijanden zullen zelfs de meest doorwinterde gamers meenemen in het avontuur van Dunamis. Verbeter je wapens door ervaring op te doen, leer krachtige magie aanvallen en pas Estelle's robotonderdelen aan naar jouw vechtstijl met de vele kristallen en onderdelen. Dunamis is een uitdagende game en zorgt voor vele uren speelplezier!

NZ.name: Infinite Dunamis
NZ.description: Merging magic and technology, Infinite Dunamis ups the ante with new turn-based battles in an epic RPG adventure! One day on his way home from a job in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by the name of Luke comes across a young woman, Estelle, being attacked in the cave near his village. After fending off her attackers, he attempts to pull her from a heap of discarded mechanical parts only to discover she herself is half robot! PT.name: Infinite Dunamis
PT.description: Um RPG de ficção emocionante, que une mágica e tecnologias. Parta para uma aventura épica com batalhas em turno! Certo dia, quando voltava para casa após um serviço na Cidade Real, um talentoso engenheiro chamado Luke encontra uma jovem, Estelle, sendo atacada na caverna próxima à sua vila. Depois de livrá-la dos agressores, ele tenta puxá-la de uma pilha de peças mecânicas descartadas e descobre que ela também é metade robô! Levemente curioso com o que acabara de se deparar, Luke decide levar Estelle para casa e repará-la, sem ter ideia da série de eventos em que ele está prestes a se meter...! Esta história única, que conta com fascinantes reviravoltas, um mundo exuberante, um clássico sistema de batalhas por turno e uma variedade de inimigos poderosos, empolga até os mais ávidos gamers! Com características intrigantes, como aperfeiçoamento de habilidade com armas, aprendizado de eletrizantes técnicas de mágica, e aprimoramento dos parâmetros de Estelle com cristais, almas e núcleos, Infinite Dunamis irá certamente certeza proporcionar inúmeras horas de diversão!

RU.name: Infinite Dunamis
RU.description: Infinite Dunamis - эпическая РПГ с пошаговыми боями, где встречаются технология и волшебство! Талантливый инженер Люк по пути домой забредает в пещеру, служащую свалкой, где группа подозрительных личностей атакует прекрасную незнакомку. Обратив обидчиков незнакомки в бегство, Люк пытается вытянуть её из-под груды запчастей и обнаруживает, что девушка - робот! Одолеваемый любопытством, Люк решает приютить и отремонтировать назвавшегося “Эстель” робота по мере возможностей. Он даже не догадывается, в какой переплёт это его заведёт... Infinite Dunamis предлагает игрокам пережить полную неожиданных поворотов историю в уникальном мире победившего паропанка. Разумеется, не обойдётся и без классических пошаговых сражений в которых, впрочем, присутствуют свои особенности. Помимо сражений, игрокам предстоит улучшать оружие, изучать магические навыки и настраивать параметры Эстель с помощью кристаллов, душ и ядер - многие часы наслаждения игрой практически гарантированны!

SE.name: Infinite Dunamis
SE.description: Merging magic and technology, Infinite Dunamis ups the ante with new turn-based battles in an epic RPG adventure! One day on his way home from a job in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by the name of Luke comes across a young woman, Estelle, being attacked in the cave near his village. After fending off her attackers, he attempts to pull her from a heap of discarded mechanical parts only to discover she herself is half robot! Somewhat curious about what he has stumbled onto, Luke decides to take Estelle home and fix her up, but little does he know about the chain of events he is about to find himself tangled up in...! With its unique steam-punk setting, gripping plot-twists, and classic turn-based battle system with a twist, Infinite Dunamis is the RPG to satisfy even the hungriest of gamers! Moreover, with its plethora of features like weapon enhancement, magic skills, and the ability to strengthen Estelle's parameters through the use of crystals, souls, and cores, gamers are sure to experience countless hours of enjoyment!
